title: lagging with no fps or ms drop
body: while im playing with my mates and others on the enemy team sometimes ave the same issue of us lagging and attempting to reconnect with no FPS or MS drops we just freeze and only since patch 7.4 ive had no issue with this in the past

replies.body: i have gotten it fixed it was my modem that was in-need of an update just ring your internet provider and see if they can do a over the internet update it took 24 hours but after that it was fixed no issues at all

same problem and i already changed all the specs to very low and the resolution to HD when my computer allows FHD but it continues to do the same particularly when in fight.
Is really frustrating and it's getting harder to play LoL
I have an i7 Processor with a dedicated 2GB nvidia and 12Gb RAM
Thank you for getting back to me I'll try all the fixes and get back to you

It seems like your connection is getting cut off completely from the game server, and the game is trying to get you back in.  This isn't really a driver or fps issue, but some problem with your network reaching us.  If this is still happening then go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help with this.  If your friends are also on the same network, that will further affirm some instability.  I hope that helps!
